title: So, i just watched the new SW movie ((No Spoilers, But beware of comments))
body:
and HOOOOOOOOOOLY SHIT!

I thought they would Botch it. 

i HONESTLY Bought a Large Dr Pepper so i could go away from the movie in-case they fucking ruined it..

BUT HOLY FUCK I COULDN'T DISTRACT MYSELF AWAY TO EVEN DRINK IT.

The Scenes? JUST AS GLORIOUS AS THE OLD ONES

The Music? SAME GLORIOUS SHIT

And the characters...

OH MY GOD THE CHARACTERS...

CANT WAIT FOR VIII
